## forceElementSizeFeature variable

This feature sets element size programmatically and only once, when [DOMContentLoaded](https://developer.mozilla.org/fr/docs/Web/Events/DOMContentLoaded) has been fired.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forceElementSizeFeature: {
    readonly script: string;
    readonly featureIdentifier: string;
    readonly assemble: (...args: [] | [ForceElementSizeOptions]) => {
        readonly featureIdentifier: string;
        readonly script: string;
        readonly options: ForceElementSizeOptions | undefined;
        readonly props?: {} | undefined;
    };
}
```
